intro: I have always had a passion for solving puzzles and building solutions and that is what drew me into the world of software.
education: I graduated from Western University in 2023, where I completed a dual-degree in Software Engineering and Business Administration.
career: Since then I have had the privilege of working at Scotiabank as a Data Analyst. In this role, I have been able to continue learning, challenge myself, and collaborate with so many incredibly talented people!
outro: I am so excited to continue building my career and learning new skills!
